name: Basset Hound
description: The Basset Hound is a short-legged breed of dog in the hound family. The Basset is a scent hound that was originally bred for the purpose of hunting hare. Their sense of smell and ability to ground-scent is second only to the Bloodhound. Basset Hounds are one of six recognized basset-type breeds in France.
weight: Female: 44–60 lbs (20–27 kg), Male: 51–64 lbs (23–29 kg)
height: Female: 11–14 inches (28–36 cm), Male: 12–15 inches (30–38 cm)
colors: Any recognized hound color
temperament: Tenacious, Devoted, Affectionate, Sweet-Tempered, Friendly, Gentle

name: Beagle
description: The beagle is a breed of small hound that is similar in appearance to the much larger foxhound. The beagle is a scent hound, developed primarily for hunting hare.
weight: Male: 22–24 lbs (10–11 kg), Female: 20–22 lbs (9–10 kg)
height: Male: 14–16 inches (36–41 cm), Female: 13–15 inches (33–38 cm)
colors: Lemon & White, Tri-color, White & Tan, Chocolate Tri, White & Chocolate, Orange & White, Red & White
temperament: Intelligent, Amiable, Determined, Excitable, Even Tempered, Gentle

name: Bloodhound
description: The Bloodhound is a large scent hound, originally bred for hunting deer, wild boar and, since the Middle Ages, for tracking people. Believed to be descended from hounds once kept at the Abbey of Saint-Hubert, Belgium, it is known to French speakers as the Chien de Saint-Hubert.
origin: Belgium, United Kingdom, France, Scotland, England
weight: Female: 80–100 lbs (36–45 kg), Male: 90–110 lbs (41–50 kg)
height: Female: 23–25 inches (58–64 cm), Male: 25–27 inches (64–69 cm)
colors: Liver & Tan, Black & Tan, Red
temperament: Stubborn, Affectionate, Even Tempered, Gentle

name: Border Collie
description: The border collie is a working and herding dog breed developed in the Scottish borders for herding livestock, especially sheep. It was specifically bred for intelligence and obedience. They are very fetch oriented.
origin: United Kingdom, Scotland, Wales, England, Ireland
weight: Male: 30–45 lbs (14–20 kg), Female: 27–42 lbs (12–19 kg)
height: Male: 19–22 inches (48–56 cm), Female: 18–21 inches (46–53 cm)
colors: Black, White, Blue, Red Merle, Blue Merle, Lilac, Brindle, Chocolate, Liver, Sable Merle, Gold, Red
temperament: Tenacious, Intelligent, Energetic, Responsive, Keen, Alert

name: Boston Terrier
description: The Boston Terrier is a breed of dog originating in the United States of America. This American Gentleman was accepted in 1893 by the American Kennel Club as a non-sporting breed. Color and markings are important when distinguishing this breed from the AKC standard.
colors: Black & White, Brindle & White, Seal & White
temperament: Intelligent, Lively, Friendly

name: Boxer
description: The Boxer is a medium to large, short-haired breed of dog, developed in Germany. The coat is smooth and tight-fitting; colors are fawn, brindled, or white, with or without white markings.
weight: Female: 55–64 lbs (25–29 kg), Male: 60–71 lbs (27–32 kg)
height: Female: 21–24 inches (53–60 cm), Male: 22–25 inches (57–63 cm)
colors: Brindle, White, Fawn
temperament: Fearless, Intelligent, Devoted, Energetic, Cheerful, Loyal, Bright, Friendly, Confident, Playful, Brave, Calm

name: Bulldog
description: The Bulldog, also known as the British Bulldog or English Bulldog, is a medium-sized dog breed. It is a muscular, hefty dog with a wrinkled face and a distinctive pushed-in nose. The Kennel Club, the American Kennel Club, and the United Kennel Club oversee breeding records.
weight: Female: 40–51 lbs (18–23 kg), Male: 51–55 lbs (23–25 kg)
height: Female: 12–16 inches (31–40 cm), Male: 12–16 inches (31–40 cm)
colors: White, Fawn, Piebald, Fawn & White, Brindle & White, Red & White, Red Brindle, Red
temperament: Docile, Willful, Gregarious, Friendly

name: Chihuahua
description: The Chihuahua is the smallest breed of dog, and is named after the Mexican state of Chihuahua.
weight: 3.3 to 6.6 lbs
height: 6 inches to 9 inches tall at the shoulder
colors: Black, White, Fawn, Cream, Chocolate, Gold
temperament: Devoted, Lively, Alert, Courageous, Quick

name: Chow Chow
description: The Chow Chow is a dog breed originally from northern China, where it is referred to as Songshi-Quan, which means puffy-lion dog.
weight: Male: 55–71 lbs (25–32 kg), Female: 44–60 lbs (20–27 kg)
height: Male: 19–22 inches (48–56 cm), Female: 18–20 inches (46–51 cm)
colors: Black, Blue, Fawn, Cream, Red
temperament: Aloof, Independent, Loyal, Quiet

name: Dalmatian
description: The Dalmatian is a breed of medium-sized dog, noted for its unique black, liver spotted coat and mainly used as a carriage dog in its early days. Its roots trace back to Croatia and its historical region of Dalmatia.
weight: Female: 35–53 lbs (16–24 kg), Male: 33–71 lbs (15–32 kg)
height: Female: 22–23 inches (56–58 cm), Male: 23–24 inches (58–61 cm)
colors: Liver & White, Black & White
temperament: Intelligent, Energetic, Sensitive, Outgoing, Active, Friendly, Playful

name: German Shepherd
description: The German Shepherd is a breed of medium to large-sized working dog that originated in Germany. In the English language, the breed's officially recognized name is German Shepherd Dog.
weight: Male: 66–88 lbs (30–40 kg), Female: 49–71 lbs (22–32 kg)
height: Male: 24–26 inches (60–65 cm), Female: 22–24 inches (55–60 cm)
colors: Black, Black & Tan, Sable, Red & Black, Grey, Black & Silver
temperament: Intelligent, Curious, Obedient, Alert, Loyal, Confident, Watchful, Courageous

name: Golden Retriever
description: The Golden Retriever is a medium-large gun dog that retrieves shot waterfowl, such as ducks and upland game birds, during hunting and shooting parties. The name retriever refers to the breed's ability to retrieve shot game undamaged due to their soft mouth.
weight: Female: 55–71 lbs (25–32 kg), Male: 65–75 lbs (30–34 kg)
height: Female: 20–22 inches (51–56 cm), Male: 22–24 inches (56–61 cm)
colors: Cream, Dark Golden, Light Golden, Golden
temperament: Reliable, Intelligent, Kind, Trustworthy, Friendly, Confident

name: Labrador Retriever
description: The Labrador Retriever, or just Labrador, is a medium-large breed of retriever-gun dog. The Labrador is the most popular breed of dog in Canada, the United Kingdom, and the United States.
weight: Male: 64–79 lbs (29–36 kg), Female: 55–71 lbs (25–32 kg)
height: Male: 22–24 inches (57–62 cm), Female: 22–24 inches (55–60 cm)
colors: Black, Chocolate, Yellow
temperament: Intelligent, Kind, Even Tempered, Outgoing, Agile, Trusting, Gentle

name: Pomeranian
description: The Pomeranian is a breed of dog of the Spitz type that is named for the Pomerania region in north-west Poland and north-east Germany in Central Europe. Classed as a toy dog breed because of its small size, the Pomeranian is descended from larger Spitz-type dogs, specifically the German Spitz.
weight: 4.2 – 7.7 lbs (Adult)
height: 7 inches to 1 foot tall at the shoulder
colors: White, Black, Grey-shaded, Tan, Brown, Orange
temperament: Intelligent, Extroverted, Sociable, Active, Friendly, Playful

name: Pug
description: The pug is a breed of dog with physically distinctive features of a wrinkly, short-muzzled face, and curled tail. The breed has a fine, glossy coat that comes in a variety of colors, most often fawn or black, and a compact square body with well-developed muscles.
weight: 14 to 18 pounds
height: Male: 12 in. (At the withers), Female: 10 in. (At the withers)
colors: Black, Fawn, Apricot, Silver Fawn
temperament: Docile, Stubborn, Charming, Clever, Sociable, Playful, Quiet, Attentive

name: Rottweiler
description: The Rottweiler is a breed of domestic dog, regarded as medium-to-large or large. The dogs were known in German as Rottweiler Metzgerhund, meaning Rottweil butchers' dogs, because their main use was to herd livestock and pull carts laden with butchered meat to market.
weight: Female: 77–110 lbs (35–48 kg), Male: 110–130 lbs (50–60 kg)
height: Female: 22–25 inches (56–63 cm), Male: 24–27 inches (61–69 cm)
colors: Black, Tan, Mahogany
temperament: Fearless, Devoted, Steady, Good-natured, Obedient, Alert, Confident, Self-assured, Courageous, Calm

name: Shetland Sheepdog
description: The Shetland Sheepdog, often known as the Sheltie, is a breed of herding dog that originated in the Shetland Islands of Scotland. The original name was Shetland Collie, but this caused controversy among the Rough Collie breeders of the time, so the breed's name was formally changed.
weight: Male: 14–27 lbs (6.4–12 kg), Female: 14–27 lbs (6.4–12 kg)
height: Male: 13–16 inches (33–41 cm), Female: 13–16 inches (33–41 cm)
colors: Merle, Tri-color, Blue Merle, Black & White, Sable & White, Black & Tan, Sable
temperament: Intelligent, Affectionate, Responsive, Lively, Reserved, Alert, Loyal, Active, Playful, Trainable, Gentle, Strong

name: Shiba Inu
description: The Shiba Inu is a Japanese breed of hunting dog. A small-to-medium breed, it is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog native to Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.
weight: Male: 18–24 lbs (8–11 kg), Female: 15–20 lbs (6.8–9 kg)
height: Male: 14–17 inches (35–43 cm), Female: 13–16 inches (33–41 cm)
colors: Red, orange, yellow, sesame, black and tan, or white
temperament: Charming, Fearless, Keen, Alert, Confident, Faithful

name: Siberian Husky
description: The Siberian Husky is a medium-sized working dog breed. The breed belongs to the Spitz genetic family. It is recognizable by its thickly furred double coat, erect triangular ears, and distinctive markings, and is smaller than a very similar-looking dog, the Alaskan Malamute.
weight: Female: 35–51 lbs (16–23 kg), Male: 44–60 lbs (20–27 kg)
height: Female: 20–22 inches (50–56 cm), Male: 21–24 inches (54–60 cm)
colors: White, Black, Agouti, Piebald, Black & Tan, Sable, Copper, Black & White, Splash, Grey, Silver, Brown, Red
temperament: Intelligent, Outgoing, Alert, Friendly, Gentle

name: Yorkshire Terrier
description: The Yorkshire Terrier is a small dog breed of terrier type, developed during the 19th century in Yorkshire, England. Ideally its maximum size is 7 pounds. A popular companion dog, the Yorkshire Terrier has also been part of the development of other breeds, such as the Silky Terrier.
weight: 4 to 6 pounds
height: Male: 7-9 in. (Adult, At Shoulder)
colors: Blue & Tan, Black & Tan, Black & Gold, Blue & Gold
temperament: Intelligent, Bold, Independent, Confident, Courageous
